WYSIWYM.ontology
Class SesameReader

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.ontology.SesameReader

public class SesameReader
extends Object

SesameReader retrieves an ontology from a Sesame repository (local or remote) and puts it either in a Sesame graph or in a OntologyModel THE URLS TO THE POLICYGRID SESAME REPOSITORIES HAVE BEEN REMOVED; TO USE THIS CLASS YOU MUST SPECIFY YOUR OWN!

Version:
1.2 26-02-2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Constructor Detail

SesameReader

public SesameReader(boolean local)
             throws SesameException
Constructs a SesameReader to a repository. Use only for a local repository; for a a remote repository, use SesameReader(String,String).

Parameters:
local - If true, this will create a local repository. If false, it will access a global repository.
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error accessing the repository.

SesameReader

public SesameReader(String repName,
                    boolean local)
             throws SesameException
Constructs a SesameReader to the named repository. Use only for a local repository; for a a remote repository, use SesameReader(String,String).

Parameters:
repName - Repository name
local - If true, this will create a local repository. If false, it will access a global repository.
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error accessing the repository

SesameReader

public SesameReader(String url,
                    String repName)
             throws SesameException
Constructs a SesameReader to the named repository.

Parameters:
url - Sesame url
repName - Repository name
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error accessing the repository
Method Detail

setSesameURL

public void setSesameURL(String url)
Set the Sesame url

Parameters:
url - Sesame url

getOntModel

public OntModel getOntModel()
                     throws SesameException
Constructs a Jena OntModel from the RDF in the repository. This method was developed for LIBER, but is not used because it takes about 45 seconds to read all three ontologies from Sesame! Better to read them from local files instead.

Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error reading from the repository

write

public void write(InputStream in)
           throws SesameException
Writes RDF data from the inputstream into the sesame repository

Parameters:
in - InputStream
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error writing to the repository

queryGraph

public GraphQueryResult queryGraph(String sparql)
                            throws SesameException
Sends the SPARQL query to the repository and results the results in a Sesame GraphQueryResult. GraphQueryResult is an Iterator of Sesame statements, which correspond to RDF triples.

Parameters:
sparql - SPARQL query
Returns:
GraphQueryResult
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error querying the repository

queryXML

public String queryXML(String sparql)
                throws SesameException
Takes a SPARQL query and sends it to Sesame; the answer is returned in XML.

Parameters:
sparql - String containing SPARQL query
Returns:
XML String
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error querying the repository

queryBinding

public QueryResult queryBinding(String sparql)
                         throws SesameException
Takes a SPARQL query and sends it to Sesame; the answer is returned as a LIBER QueryResult. The QueryResult orders all search results by the Sesame ID in the first variable of the query.

Parameters:
sparql - String containing SPARQL query
Returns:
QueryResult
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error querying the repository

queryBinding

public QueryResult queryBinding(String sparql,
                                String id)
                         throws SesameException
Takes a SPARQL query and sends it to Sesame; the answer is returned as a LIBER QueryResult. This method assumes that all search results belong to the object with the given ID! The results are all assigned to the same BindingSet in QueryResult.

Parameters:
sparql - String containing SPARQL query
id - Sesame ID
Returns:
QueryResult
Throws:
SesameException - if there is an error querying the repository

finalize

protected void finalize()
                 throws Throwable
Closes the connection to the Sesame repositor

Overrides:
finalize in class Object
Throws:
Throwable - if there is any error
